text: Chris Ellis (born April 14, 1956) is an American movie, television, stage, and voice actor. He was born in Dallas, Texas, and raised in Memphis, Tennessee. His career began in 1979. He is known for his roles in Days of Thunder, Apollo 13, Armageddon, My Cousin Vinny, and in The Dark Knight Rises. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Dallas Category:Actors from Memphis, Tennessee
title: Chris Ellis
